item.title: Two bags of rubbish have been dumped just inside Butterfly lane at the Bexley road end., 7th July
item.description:
These two bags were previously (until Saturday just gone) right outside a house in Oakways for approximately one week. I took a closer look at them only to find a provisional driving license on tho top of one, I have removed the license for security reasons and still have it in my possession.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Close, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle - No MOT, 7th July
item.description:
There is an abandoned vehicle parked on Rothschild Street, West Norwood, London, SE27 0HQ for some time now. Make: Mercedes. Colour: Silver. Reg: EG04 XXT It has no MOT. Please send someone to assess and remove it to allow for people to park who work in the vicinity. Please see images attached for reference.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rothschild Street, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Trees here losing dead branches, 7th July
item.description:
There has been a branch falling onto a moving vehicle, this has then shattered onto the road, the vehicle had a roof rack on, and has saved a lot of damage, however this could of been so different. The other trees in the area/strech of road (kemnal Road) between bromley lane and ashfield lane are black and dead looking, with potential to drop onto the road/vehicles in the same way. Can this be investigate asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kemnal Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard damage - 31 Salusbury Rd, London NW6 6BF, 7th July
item.description:
Bollards surrounding the parking bay in front of 31 Salusbury Rd, London NW6 6BF (m and s) is damaged. It's completely out and the metal bit is blocking the road. Please can this be fixed as its a health hazard, people have tripped over this.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle for Removal, 7th July
item.description:
There is an abandoned vehicle parked on Rothschild Street, West Norwood, London, SE27 0HQ for some time now. Make: Jaguar. Colour: Blue/Silver. Reg: S14 UTC. It has some damage to it and as you can see it has no MOT. Please send someone to assess and remove it to allow for people to park who work in the vicinity. Please see images attached for reference.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rothschild Street, West Norwood, London
